name: No Tale
description:
Hi, I challenge you!

Will you be able to complete all the levels in the shortest possible time? 

Only you can find out!

"Without victories on great challenges there is no room for glory."

Join Discord  https://discord.gg/fqgShANFMK

You can use WASD and SPACE to move around the map, with TAB pause and exit with ESC. This is a game idea or a platformer in which there will be random generation levels that you MUST complete as quickly as possible, otherwise the whole game will reset and you will lose everything.

(This is just the game concept)

-OnlyGio
